name: Leviathan (itch) (skellybellie)
description:
Forced underwater from rising sea levels, civilization continues to survive albeit by a thread. Resources are scarce, tensions are high, and any opportunity to make ends meet is worth the risk no matter the cost.

Wulf Hayden, a scavenger for a living, searches relentlessly for scrapped parts and resources he can use to sell or to survive. He stumbles upon a sunken submarine known as the Leviathan and begins to salvage what he can all while unaware of what lurks within...

Armed with nothing but an oxygen tank and a means of distraction, he must find a way to collect everything he needs while avoiding an unfortunate encounter. 

Controls:

Movement - WASD

Crouch - C

Toggle Oxygen - Q

Place / Activate Pulse Bomb - Right Click

Pick up / Interact - Left Click

Inventory Menu - TAB
